name: Palladawn
description:
Compete 1v1 in this fast-paced mashup of the classics, Pong and Breakout. Use special abilities to your advantage to outscore your opponent.

Note from the developer:

This game is cancelled and therefore unfinished. Because it is unfinished you should expect to encounter bugs and unintended effects. We decided to release this as a free product to gauge interest but, ultimately it is unlikely we will ever return to this. So don't expect any updates.
